summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating Fund and the City street Fund for preparation of a transportation environmental impact study of traffic and parking mitigation requirements relating to the future siting of a sports arena proposed to be located south of the Kingdome and cost estimating of proposed solutions; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1990 Budget of the Engineering Department; and authorizing the Mayor to execute an agreement with King County.
